author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Add a test to check that the framework handles correctly the case of `edm::Wrapper<T>` where:
  - `T` has a dictionary
  - `edm::Wrapper<T>` does not have a dictionary
  - the corresponding `classes.h` file includes CUDA headers

#### PR validation:

The new unit test currently fails, due to a known issue in the ROOT distribution (#47400).
Updating the ROOT build to generate the `cuda.pcm` file (cms-sw/cmsdist#9765) avoids the fatal exception, and lets ROOT report a missing dictionary normally.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

To be backported to 15.0.x for data taking.
title: Add a test for missing dictionaries with CUDA headers
